channel.title: "RSServer" - Should it really be a sticky?
channel.description:
URL: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,384849.0.html
I don't think it should be a sticky (it currently is?) because it isn't even open-source, and it hasn't even come too far. I don't see why it should be stuck, others have made much more progress in open-source projects/etc. Just because it's Speljohan doesn't mean it should be an icon of the server development section.
This isn't in the "Veteran Polls" section because as far as I know that is for voting for new veterans. Discuss, and vote.

item.title: "RSServer" - Should it really be a sticky?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Thug-life:

My access to the polls section wasn’t restored after i asked for my Global mod rank removed

I’ll fix that for you.

[quote=“blakeman8192, post:14, topic:292639”]How did this thread get so completely off topic? o.o
Requesting a lock.[/quote]
I’m not a fan of locking topics in internal sections (should I really have to?). I believe people will see your post and take it into consideration before making anymore replies; there isn’t anyone in here that’s unreasonable.

Read full topic
item.source: "RSServer" - Should it really be a sticky?

item.title: "RSServer" - Should it really be a sticky?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Cheese_Police, post:11, topic:292639”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=386624.msg2911892#msg2911892 date=1250150776]

vet polls? i cant even see that section?

The polls section is only viewable by people with the Moparscape Vet rank. You can’t see it because you’re a Community Member, and never previously had Moparscape Vet.

That aside, however, I’d be happy to nominate you given your contribution to the section. In reality though you aren’t really missing out on much.

us community members should really be able to see it, its not like we are incapable

You shouldn’t be throwing the word ‘we’ around so freely. Quite a few of the community members see you as unworthy, so perhaps ‘they’ would be more appropriate than ‘we’ in your post.
I have no intention of increasing your access further.

their views are fairly irrelevant in this instance dont you think
[/quote]

either way you are a fucking moron[/quote]
you’re like a broken record

Read full topic
item.source: "RSServer" - Should it really be a sticky?

item.title: "RSServer" - Should it really be a sticky?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:6, topic:292639”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=386624.msg2897280#msg2897280 date=1249290753]

vet polls? i cant even see that section?

The polls section is only viewable by people with the Moparscape Vet rank. You can’t see it because you’re a Community Member, and never previously had Moparscape Vet.

That aside, however, I’d be happy to nominate you given your contribution to the section. In reality though you aren’t really missing out on much.
[/quote]
us community members should really be able to see it, its not like we are incapable[/quote]
You shouldn’t be throwing the word ‘we’ around so freely. Quite a few of the community members see you as unworthy, so perhaps ‘they’ would be more appropriate than ‘we’ in your post.
I have no intention of increasing your access further.

peterbjornx:

how can you increase the chance to get vet?

I would be happy to nominate you, and given your contributions to this section so far I don’t believe anyone would be against the nomination.

item.title: "RSServer" - Should it really be a sticky?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:6, topic:292639”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=386624.msg2897280#msg2897280 date=1249290753]

vet polls? i cant even see that section?

The polls section is only viewable by people with the Moparscape Vet rank. You can’t see it because you’re a Community Member, and never previously had Moparscape Vet.

That aside, however, I’d be happy to nominate you given your contribution to the section. In reality though you aren’t really missing out on much.
[/quote]
us community members should really be able to see it, its not like we are incapable[/quote]

Why? Were you voted in as a MoparScape Vet? If you believe you should have access to their section, should they not have access to your section? The only community members that are able to see the Veteran Polls section are the ones that were previously Vets, then were upgraded to CM. By those members, I mean: Thug-life, Apoc, and oksuper_.

Read full topic
